name: Deposits
description: Accounts where customers place money for safekeeping and earn interest or maintain liquidity.

name: Loans & Credit
description: Products where the bank lends money to individuals or businesses with repayment terms and interest.

name: Investment & Wealth
description: Products that help customers grow wealth through securities, funds, and portfolio management.

name: Insurance
description: Products that provide financial protection against risks such as death, accidents, or property damage.

name: Payments & Transactions
description: Services that enable money transfers, digital payments, and day-to-day banking transactions.

name: Business Banking
description: Products and services tailored for businesses, including loans, cash management, and merchant services.

name: Treasury & Trade Finance
description: Products that support large-scale corporate finance, risk management, and international trade.

name: Savings Account
description: An account that earns interest while keeping funds accessible.

name: Certificate of Deposit
description: A fixed-term deposit with a higher interest rate.

name: Personal Loan
description: A fixed-sum loan for personal use with monthly repayments.

name: Credit Card
description: A revolving credit line with a set spending limit.

name: Mutual Fund
description: A pooled investment product managed by professionals.

name: Retirement Account
description: A tax-advantaged account for retirement savings.

name: Life Insurance
description: A policy that pays beneficiaries upon the insuredâ€™s death.

name: Travel Insurance
description: Covers trip cancellations, medical emergencies, and lost luggage.

name: Debit Card
description: A card linked to a checking account for daily spending.

name: Wire Transfer
description: Electronic transfer of funds between banks domestically or internationally.

name: Merchant Services
description: Payment processing solutions for businesses, including POS terminals.

name: Business Loan
description: A loan designed to help businesses with expansion or operations.

name: Letter of Credit
description: A guarantee from a bank ensuring payment in international trade.

name: Foreign Exchange Service
description: Currency exchange solutions for global businesses and trade.
